clinical_study.brief_title: European Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS) Depression Study
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Evaluation of Different Device Parameters for the Management of Patients With Treatment Resistant Major Depressive Disorder, Single or Recurrent Episode, With Deep Brain Stimulation

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the effects of two different programming settings of deep brain stimulation (DBS) in the subgenual white matter (Brodmann Area 25 WM) as an adjunctive treatment for TR-MDD, single or recurrent episode on mood as measured by the MADRS.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of change from mean baseline values in MADRS score

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of change from baseline value of HDRS
